access-code-clear-tooltip-disabled: You can't clear the access code because you haven't set up one yet.
access-code-clear-tooltip-enabled: Clears the already set up wishlist access code making all the protected items visible again.
access-code-wishlist: Enter the access code to view the wishlist's hidden items
delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the {{wishlist}} wishlist?
enter-wishlist-name: Enter the name of your new wishlist
set-wishlist-password-first: Set the wishlist access code first.
share-disabled: You have to verify to share wishlists.
